faq.question: How long will a battery power my East Windsor home during an outage?
faq.answer: Battery backup duration depends on your East Windsor home's consumption and battery size. A single Tesla Powerwall (13.5 kWh) can power essential circuits (fridge, lights, WiFi, outlets) for 24+ hours, or whole-home for 8-12 hours depending on usage. With solar panels, the battery recharges daily for indefinite backup. For complete whole-home backup, most East Windsor homes need 2-3 Powerwalls. We'll design the right system for your needs.
